attributes.action: Remove the recent pay rise for MPs due to ineffective conduct regarding Brexit.
attributes.background: In view of the inadequate handling of Brexit, and particularly taking into account a lack of an equitable pay rise for other public sector workers eg NHS staff for several years now, we feel that a pay rise for MPs is inappropriate.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
